title: Anil Ambani's Reliance Infra to get Rs 1,100 crore equity infusion from promoters
description: Reliance Infrastructure Ltd, led by Anil Ambani, is set to receive Rs 1,100 crore from promoters and Rs 1,910 crore from two Mumbai-based investment firms. The board approved a Rs 6,000 crore fund raise plan. The preferential issue will enhance the company's net worth to Rs 12,000 crore with near zero debt.
